Herdade da Hera:
Tourism and leisure area. Farm animals, organic gardens, comun kitchen and living room... Our door is closed because the animals are loose on the place. You have a doorbell on the gate. Wish you a wonderful trip!

name: Le Jasmin Etoilé
title: (2070-352) Le Jasmin Etoilé

Once a week: butcher and fishmonger. Cash machine. Pets accepted. If booking a minimum of one week, we take you to the supermarket for free for your purchases. Possibility to rent a kitchen tent with two pieces of furniture and an induction hob for a minimum of one week.

name: Cais da Vala Real
title: (2120) Cais da Vala Real
description: Flat illuminated free gravel parking at opposite site of small marina and small arm of Tejo river. Quiet for overnight. No shadows. No services.

title: (2140) - 2 N243
description:
At the entrance to the village of Chouto Nationale 243, new motorhome area, gray and black water drainage, water tap, 12 electricity outlets (currently disabled).
200 meters from the center where there is pharmacy, restaurants, small supermarket.
Quiet, easy access to any size motorhome.
On-site garbage can is very small but just outside the gate is a bigger blue bin that is also a garbage can (see last photo).

title: (2120-092) Salvaterra de Magos - 201 N118
description: Easy access direct from N 118 main road inside small town, with flat illuminated and free P without shadows and free service area. Picnic tables on bottom. Inside town so several shopping and supermarket around. If you like bullfighting, here is main event; also works with hawks (search “Falcoaria Real”). The area is safe but noisy mainly in working days as just aside main road and also main roundpoint with many trucks traffic. For quiet overnight, choose “Cais da Vala Real” near small marina (1,2 km N top of town).

title: (2120-097) Salvaterra de Magos - Unnamed Road
description: Picnic area by the lake, with a river running to the next town. Very quiet. Here you could also spend a quiet night. Please take your rubbish with you as there are no rubbish bins.

title: (2100) Área Serviço Autocaravanas da Erra

title_short: (2100) Coruche - 1 R. do Açude da Agolada

title: (2380) Malhou - CM1442
description: Parking lot of the Praia Fluvial Olhos D'Agua in an olive grove. Shady and flat places available. You have to try something out. At Praia Fluvial, which is about 3 minutes from the parking lot, there are toilets, cold showers, trash cans, a bar / restaurant and tent camping next to the river bath. There are no facilities at the parking lot itself. A road leads past the parking lot and is also used at night. It can be noisy at the weekend, as the Praia is very busy in summer. Unfortunately there is rubbish everywhere.

title: (2100) Coruche - Coruche
description: Parking of ten seats very quiet! I advise you when the market does not take place because of service taken by the market !!

title: (2380) - CM1442
description: WC, picnic tables, view of the river, beautiful place!

description:
parking lot.
  Alternative to Caravan Park on a fair day.
Very nice, quiet and clean.
We stayed 1 night without any problem
Good views. Practically within the locality. By the market, cafes, etc.

title: (2100-201) Coruche -

title: (2130) Benavente -

title: (2040-481) Asseiceira -

title_short: (2040) Rio Maior - Avenida Doutor Mário Soares

title_short: (2350) Torres Novas - 3 Avenida Doutor João Martins de Azevedo

title: () Vila Nova da Barquinha - EM1190

title: (2040-133) Rio Maior - 39 Estrada das Salinas
description: Parking in Las Salinas, on the right side there is a parking lot in the shelter of the trees, with bathrooms. There is a restaurant nearby and small cabins that offer drinks and food. We arrived at the last minute and there was hardly anyone else. Recommended if you are in the Park and looking for a place to spend the night.

title: (2330) Entroncamento - 89 Avenida das Forças Armadas

title: (2040) Rio Maior - 69 Estrada das Salinas
description:
Salinas de Rio Maior. Large gravel car park almost flat. 100m from the village, the saltworks and the shops. Very quiet night despite the proximity of the road, but not very busy at night.
Very typical village with its wooden houses and its very rare "terrestrial" saltworks. I also recommend the Solar do Sal Restaurant and its excellent Portuguese-style chicken at very moderate prices in a beautiful rustic setting. The owner is very friendly and speaks French. I recommend

title: (2040) - Rua dos Potes Mouros
description: Follow signs '' formacao prismaticos basalticos ''. Spot with beautiful view of the serra, very very quiet, at the foot of the volcanic rock with natural water source 50m before, and small lake hidden 200m. Shady all morning! Gravel road very passable!

name: Parque de Autocaravanas de Arripiado

title: (2040-015) Alcobertas - Rua do Olho de Água
title_short: (2040-015) Alcobertas - Rua do Olho de Água

title: (2040) - 33 Rua São Francisco de Assis
description: In the heart of the Serras de Aire e Candeeiros Natural Park, the Chãos-Alcobertas Service Área offers parking and overnight status for 5 motorhomes, as well as water and energy supply, loading and unloading and cleaning services for 1 vehicle. It is locate in a calm and pleasant place, with a Picnic área, set in a unique landscape. In the área you have access to 4 walking routes and a wide range of cultural and leisure activities. In the surroundings there is also a panoramic restaurant.

title: (2040) Rio Maior - IC2
description: GasProCar Gasstation. Possibility to get foreign gas bottles filled. Filled our german bottle without problems.

title: (2550-012) Alguber - R. Mapril Fogaca

address.street: 32 Rua Principal, R. do Arrife do Raro

title: (2350) Pedrógão - R do Arrife do Raro
title_short: (2350) Pedrógão - R do Arrife do Raro
description: Place next to the picknick area, very nice and quiet. A lot of trees and you can do different hiking routes from here. Space for two campers next to the ‘road’.

title: (2395-104) Minde - 308 Avenida São Sebastião
description: Very close to Intermarché

title: (2350) Pedrógão - Unnamed Road
description: Picnic area at an old quarry with a great view. Ascent from the nature camp only with off-road vehicle / 4x4! Motorhome drivers, please take a look, 30 minutes on foot. Large flat surface made of bare rock

title: (2395-104) Minde - 425 Avenida São Sebastião
description: Gas station with washer and dryer

title: (2580-523) Alenquer -
description: Large clean and quiet parking two taps a few trash cans

title: (2580) Carregado - Quinta de Alconchel
description: Intermarché supermarket of ​​Carregado (on EN 1 between Alenquer and Vila Franca de Xira (Portugal). Ask water lock key (free use) at fuel station nearby.

title: (2135) Samora Correia - 13 Rua dos Operários Agricolas
title_short: (2135) Samora Correia - 13 Rua dos Operários Agricolas
description:
Large parking space close to the cultural center, piscine and cemetery. Calm during the night. Light posts running the whole night.
Nothing special just a easy parking spot for a night.

title: (2100) Couço - Ponte de Santa Justa
description: Good place for the night and the rest, at the edge of the river and the garden.

title: (2135-322) Samora Correia - 144 Rua dos Operários Agrícolas
title_short: (2135-322) Samora Correia - 144 Rua dos Operários Agrícolas
description: LPG station. Easy access, but mind the 2 meter awning. No self-service so check opening hours.

title: (2580) Alenquer - 2 Rua Serpa Pinto
description: Small flat parking area next to a derelict morgue.  100m away from the road. 10 min walk into the village with shops, restaurants and cafe’s.

title: () - Unnamed Road
description: This is a nice place to have a lunch. And see the Ribatejo

title: (2130) Santo Estevão - Rua Direita
description: A very quiet place to spend the night. In my opinion much better than the other place around here, since it is not the access road to a property. Only in the morning did a car come by. Please leave it as clean as you found it!

title: (2580) Alenquer - N9
description: At the edge of the road but quiet, table and barbecue, very good inexpensive restaurant, friendly and French-speaker.

title: (2100) Couço - 36 Rua do Comercio
description: Charming circular parking lot near N4 and very close to the village of Courço. Two free water terminals picnic tables and play area for children. Garbage cans in the tuff car park opposite. Very peaceful night!

name: Parque de Campismo Rural da Serra de Montejunto
title: (2580) Parque de Campismo Rural da Serra de Montejunto
title_short: (2580) Parque de Campismo Rural da Serra de Montejunto
description: Very nice camping place in nature. We must arrive till 5 PM. I spent just one day because i was finishing my August holidays. I will return as soon as possible.

title: (2550) - Unnamed Road
description: End of the world for autonomous motorhomes, parking in the mountains, 2 tracks of 3 km of nature walk. Close to a campsite (not closed in winter). Windmills. Wind turbines on the horizon. Few telephone network, wifi at the campsite and free wifi Cadaval and office which serves as a tourist office.

title: (2040) Rio Maior - R. Principal
description: Slightly sloping parking lot, lots of space, quiet but hum of wind turbines following the wind.

title: (2395) Minde - 2025 Estrada Nossa Senhora de Fátima
title_short: (2395) Minde - 2025 Estrada Nossa Senhora de Fátima
description: Parking on the edge of agglomeration, with the purring of the highway in the distance.

title: (2475) Benedita - 20 Rua do Lapeirão
description: Large park, for travelers, truckers to park for rest or sleep. Restaurant / cafe open 24/24, with WC and free shower for guests. The property has a bakery. The park has charging stations for electric cars (Tesla and communes).

title: (2395) Minde - 103 Estrada Nossa Senhora de Fátima
title_short: (2395) Minde - 103 Estrada Nossa Senhora de Fátima
description: Nice public picnic area to protect. Small barbecue available. Ideal for children. A bit noisy because of the road. Beware no service or trash.

title: (2550) Ariero - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful panoramic views, 600m up, the highest point nearby by far, you can enjoy the sunrise and sunset next to the 18th century chapel, an old point of pilgrimage that still attracts visitors today. It's right next to a vast amount of antennas (ref highest point for miles), doesn't bother us but It'd look nicer without them. Opportunity to hike or bike to surrounding areas, no shade or services, easy road access, lots of space with relatively flat parking.

title: (2130) Santo Estevão - Unnamed Road
description: Small location along a road with little traffic (cul de sac). We spent the night here, and only two cars passed. Pleasant location and peaceful night, but without any service.

title: () - Rua do Barreiro
description: Nature, panorama and tranquility! Corner to explore! Other places surely as nice as this one, chosen at random when leaving the summit route. Worth a visit for the villages with countless small stone walls characteristic of the place. In the heights of the natural park with magnificent views of the plains and surely on the Nazaré Sea (for us covered by a cloud bank in the distance). The site is at the entrance to one of the park's hikes, and has a pretty stone vestige and two uninhabited houses (one of which is open to the winds) in the middle of the pines. Not a cat in the middle of August, seems very little frequented (the foot!). Windy, very pleasant in hot weather, a little less on an evening of bad weather.

title: (2480) São Bento - Rua Luís de Camões
title_short: (2480) São Bento - Rua Luís de Camões
description: Free parking area above the town with 6 individually laid out bays. Each bay is fully serviced with electricity, water and drainage (electricity and water not working on our visit probably because the aire has only recently opened, November 2019).Lovely area, very quiet.

title: (2600-610) Castanheira do Ribatejo - 27 Rua de Padre António Bianchi
title_short: (2600-610) Castanheira do Ribatejo - 27 Rua de Padre António Bianchi
description: Quiet parking to spend the night, next to the road touching the urbanization

name: Quinta Centro Lusitano Portugal
title: (2100) Quinta Centro Lusitano Portugal
description:
Nice place in the middle off nature. 
The owner is a host of workaway.info.
so you can park here in exchange for your farm help!
Phone number available to Pro subscribers
we do not provide any electricity and water...
u only work for a place where u can stand.

title: (2486) Mira de Aire - 110 Avenida Mota Pinto
title_short: (2486) Mira de Aire - 110 Avenida Mota Pinto
description: Place with sloping parking, both day/night, above town and next to the football stadium.  Services available - electricity, water and drainage and parking to go to the nearby caves.

title: (2485) Alvados -
description:
A big parking lot next to the Santo-Antonio cave. 
We spendt one night here. 
Litle traffic on the road, quiet and peaceful.

title: () Praia do Ribatejo - N3
description: Free parking and service point, worth a night or two. Lots of flat parking overlooking river & bridge. Pretty village 5 mins walk over the bridge with shops. Beware steep drive direct to bottom level, if you access by entering top level (left) first the next slope is much better.

title: (2250-020) Constância - Avenida das Forças Armadas
description: Self service laundry which was installed in March 2019 at the entrance of the camp site. Three machines 18kg 8kg washers and 18kg drier. Cafe next door.

name: Alma do Zêzere camping
title: (2250) Alma do Zêzere camping
description: Very nice camping near the river and in a typical village. Not expensive.

title: (2550-368) DaMinhaCasa Park - Cadaval - Rua fonte do Telheiro - Murteira
title_short: (2550-368) DaMinhaCasa Park - Cadaval - Rua fonte do Telheiro - Murteira
description: Country house with a beautiful view of the Montejunto mountain, offers parking for motorhomes, caravans and tents. Allows contact with nature: space with animals such as chickens and goats. Possibility to purchase homemade products such as cheese, eggs and bread. Our motto is: "Happiness is in the simple things"

name: O Torricado
title: (2135) O Torricado
description: Restaurant and cafe with truck parking. We asked to stay the night and they agreed it’s ok. The showers are available.

title: (2480) Alvados -
description: Ample space to park for the night for multiple RVs/vans. Quiet spot with no homes in sight and an amazing lookout over the valley below. The only building nearby is the ticket office for the Alvado caves.

title: (2480-034) Alvados - Unnamed Road
description:
Park place next to the Alvados grotto. It is not specific for van but you can park for a quit night and no one will say anything. In the morning you can visit the grotto. 
you have a nice view to the mountains.

title: (2495) Fátima - IP1
description: Really nice rest area with 220v outlets for free, restrooms and water. Picnic tables also available.

title: (2475-150) Benedita - 207 Rua da Fábrica da Sola
title_short: (2475-150) Benedita - 207 Rua da Fábrica da Sola
description: Flat parking, in the parking lot of the municipal swimming pool. Calm at night. On Saturday evening some young people, but without problem.

title: (2480) - 13 Rua da Lagoa Grande
description: To spend a quiet night in the natural park, by a lake. There are very clean public toilets, tables, a barbecue, water.

title: (2485) Mira de Aire - 371 Rua Chão de Empires
title_short: (2485) Mira de Aire - 371 Rua Chão de Empires
description: Very nice place for 2 vans or 1 large camper. It is on the edge of a dirt road. Quiet night and beautiful morning with birdsong and a view of the "Ventas do Diabo". Please keep this site as clean as we did!

title: (2475-126) Benedita - 23 Rua 16 de Maio
description: Only vehicles up to 3500kg.  Free parking spaces on a tree-lined road.  Adjacent to a beautiful children's playground, small square, garden with benches.  On the other side of the gas station self-service washing machines with free wifi.  At 5 minutes walking distance from the center.

title: (2600) - N10
description: Repsol petrol station. Water available at the tire pressure level. Free

title: (2600-209) Vila Franca de Xira - 6 N1
description: Intermarché gas station, with washing machine

title: (7425) Montargil - 71 Rua Heróis do Ultramar
description: Quiet for overnight stay

title: (7425-125) Montargil - 20 Rua Heróis do Ultramar
description: Public car park. Straight places. About 20 spots. Crane is located at the exit of the wheelchairs to the football spot. Do not discharge waste water. Keep the place clean.

title: (7425) Montargil - 1B Rua Luís de Camões
description:
Public parking lot

with WiFi , very calm and with restaurants and coffee nearby

title: (7425-130) Montargil - 22 Rua Manuel Alves do Carmo
title_short: (7425-130) Montargil - 22 Rua Manuel Alves do Carmo
description: Confirmed the possibility of staying for the night with local police (GNR)

name: Camping
title: (2600) Camping
description: Municipal campsite, associated with the swimming pool. Good stopover after visiting Lisbon. Easy access. The places are not big. Electricity, water, toilets and showers.

title: (2480-032) Alvados - 407 Rua Val do Bispo
description: A small place in the village with toilet and shower (cold) and drinking water. Too tight for large CC, only for smaller vehicles

title: (2600) Vila Franca de Xira - Ponte Marechal Carmona
title_short: (2600) Vila Franca de Xira - Ponte Marechal Carmona
description: Small place for vans and small campers. View of the river. we only stopped for a short lunch break, possibly also overnight. Road / bridge right next to it, therefore slight driving noise. apparently parking for anglers.

title: (7425) Montargil - 8 Praceta Salgueiro Maia
description: Public free park next to a road... 1 night and no problems. Nice view a few meters from the park

title: (2600) Vila Franca de Xira - 32 Rua Joaquim Pedro Monteiro
title_short: (2600) Vila Franca de Xira - 32 Rua Joaquim Pedro Monteiro
description: At the end of a dead end. Wide and little traffic. Parking on the roadside. Town, shops within walking distance, few 100 m.

title: (7425) Montargil - Unnamed Road
description: Nice place, close to the water, with some shade.

title: (2250) - Unnamed Road
description: Parking to visit downtown Viva Science Astronomie. For Myores and children. We spent one night without a problem. Only there was wind. Superb view.

title: (2600-167) Vila Franca de Xira - 235 Rua Doutor Miguel Bombarda
title_short: (2600-167) Vila Franca de Xira - 235 Rua Doutor Miguel Bombarda
description: Laundromat, with very clean washing machine and dryer

title: (2550) Cadaval - 20 Rua das Castanholas
description: Nice launderette, free WiFi available. Nearby is a park with playground.

title: (2490) Ourém - 667 Rua Principal
description: Small village with possibility to park during the day or overnight close to the church. Worth to visit the Dinosaurs Park with feet printings of some of the biggest dinosaurs on earth (Sauropedes) and a small Jurassic Park. Possible to park at the Dinosaurs Park.

title: (2480) Alvados -
description: Picnic park located next to the municipal road to Alvados. Equipped with WC and BBQ area. Everything very clean and taken care of. The bathrooms have electricity with a socket. There is also a small lagoon that is very low, perhaps due to the time of year. Close to hiking trails.

title: (7425) Montargil - N2
description: Beautiful view to the river. Very quite.

title: (7425) Montargil - Unnamed Road
description: Awesome place to relax. Easy road. Easy access

title: (2600) Vila Franca de Xira - 12 Rua Bica do Chinelo
title_short: (2600) Vila Franca de Xira - 12 Rua Bica do Chinelo
description: Free public parking under the road on several floors. Quiet and not busy. The town is walkable from the car park. We spent a carefree afternoon and night there.

title: (7425) Montargil -
description: With view for montargil dam, quiet and peaceful. Near the water. Don't sleep here because it's part of Natura 2000.

title: (2600) Vila Franca de Xira - Caminho Pedonal Ribeirinho
title_short: (2600) Vila Franca de Xira - Caminho Pedonal Ribeirinho
description: Next to the Bull fight arena in the south of Vila Franca Xira. In the city.

title: (7425) Montargil - N2
description:
Praia Fluvial do Pintadinho. Just ov
er the lake outside Orbitur permisses. Stayed a night and great for morning dive, but also during holidays on a Monday. Enjoy!

name: Parque de Campismo Orbitur Montargil
title: () Parque de Campismo Orbitur Montargil
description: 4 km north of the village of Montargil, this Orbitur Group campsite is located on the banks of a huge artificial lake. Pleasant and well equipped certainly, but without soul. Lots of chalets, mobile homes and rather young locals who get together on weekends to play the guitar and party with a beer in hand! Swimming pool, bar / snacks, convenience store, excellent wifi connection in the area reserved for motorhomes and TV reception without problem. Quality sanitary facilities and very well maintained.

title: (2490) Ourém - Rua Principal
description: Nice quiet place in olive forest, no service available.

title: (7425) Montargil - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful corner isolated from the world here at Montargil dam. Silence, lake to swim, eagles flying around, great bird watching and the best part no one around. If you come here be respectful and don’t make fires or trash the place.Bumpy road with sharp turns must be hard if wet but we came in summer so it was dry. A big fig tree close by if you are lucky to be here on the right season for it.

title: (7425) Montargil - N2
description: Perfect place to spend an afternoon. We have been alone all day. It seems like a quiet place to spend the night. Narrow track access, better with a van.

title: (2350) - Estrada das Moreiras
description: Unpaved road in the eucalyptus and pine forest. Good for one night, fom campers only up to 6m.

title: (2205) Tramagal - 62 N118
description: Free water supply for motorhomes. Picnic tables.

title: (7425) Montargil - N2
description: Breathtaking, breathtaking, magnificent views over the lake. Complete silence with nature all around. Great place to watch the stars and sunrise, RVs are forbidden

title: (2480) Alcaria - 118 Rua Manuel João Luís Salgueiro Alcaria
title_short: (2480) Alcaria - 118 Rua Manuel João Luís Salgueiro Alcaria
description: Outdoor nature place with picnic area. We spent a very quiet day among the pines. Road nearby . A nice little place for a break.

address.street: 118 Rua Manuel João Luís Salgueiro Alcaria

title: (2205) Tramagal -
description: Wonderful place to stay one night beside de river Tagus. very calm but a litle bit slopy. enough for 2 or 3 campers. we spent One night with the noise of the surrounding trees and the ducks at the river.

name: Campo de Futebol da Bezerra
title: (2480) Campo de Futebol da Bezerra
description: It is a place at the start of the Ecopista walk. There is a playground and a football field. It is outdated on the one hand, but the facilities for motorhomes seem very new. There are toilets but they are closed. There is also a place to bbq, but no idea if that can be used. Water works. Everything for free.

title: (2460-615) Moleanos - Estrada Nacional 1, km 95
description: Clearance area, open from Monday to Saturday, from 9:30 am to 7:30 pm. Along with a store of accessories, liquids, Repsol gas. Store closed for lunch 1pm to 2.30pm. You can use tables and benches for picnics.  It is located on ESTRADA NACIONAL 1 - Km 95 - MOLEANOS.  Be sure to visit the motorhome utilities store on site.

title: (2350) - 1 Rua dos Moinhos
description: Beautiful place in the middle of old mills with picnic tables enjoying a beautiful view from above over the valley, we spent one night there with our children without problem, no service.

title: (2600) Alhandra - 44 Rua Dom Tomás de Almeida
title_short: (2600) Alhandra - 44 Rua Dom Tomás de Almeida
description: Merendas Park Dr Sousa Martins. With numerous picnic tables, barbecues and even laundry machines. It consists of a large parking lot that would be good to sleep if it were not for the noise of the National that passes nearby.

title: () - 4
description: Mountain bike center with shower and toilet, very clean parking lot
